description: A simple 4 ingredient recipe for a refreshing lemonade base.
keywords: Lemonade,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Classic Lemonade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan with the water and sugar and cook until the sugar melts.
Once the sugar has melted, add the chopped lemons and allow to cook for 30 seconds and remove from the heat.
Skin and segment the blood orange and add to the pan.
Allow to cool fully before using a sieve to transfer the liquid to a jug or suitable container for the fridge.
Place the lemonade base in the fridge to cool fully for 3 hours.
Remove the cooled lemonade base and serve with sparkling water and ice if required.
